title: Ricardo Lobo
text:
Ricardo Lobo (リカルド・ロボ | born May 20, 1984) is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who plays for <a href="Futebol%20Clube%20Cascavel">Cascavel</a>.
On January 14, 2010 Ricardo Lobo transferred to <a href="Tochigi%20S.C.">Tochigi S.C.</a> in <a href="J.%20League%20Division%202">J. League Division 2</a>. In January 2015, he re-signed for Cypriot club <a href="Doxa%20Katokopias%20F.C.">Doxa Katokopias</a>.
